document.heading: Capitol Hill North Expansion and Expansion of Business Improvement District Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-183, the “Capitol Hill North Expansion and Expansion of Business Improvement District Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-456, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 7, 2002, and June 4, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 21, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-384 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-183 became effective on October 1,
